## SparseVector.scalarMultiply() method

Implements vector multiplication by a scalar

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scalar | <code>S</code> | The scalar by which to multiply |
